food.question: I am long and yellow and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me.
💛 I'm often yellow when I'm ripe.
📏 I'm a curved fruit.

food.question: I am a round fruit that's often red or green, and I grow on trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow in orchards.
🍎 Snow White ate one.
🥧 You can bake me into a pie.

food.question: I am white and fluffy, and I taste great with butter. You eat me a lot with dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I'm often served with a fork.
🌾 I come from a grain.
🍚 You can find me in a bowl.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves me.
🥕 I grow underground.
🥕 I'm a healthy snack.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from cows. I make your bones strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 Cows produce me.
🥛 I'm often white.
💪 I'm good for your bones.

food.question: I am a small, round vegetable that can be red, yellow, or green. You often see me in salads. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I can be juicy and small.
🌱 I grow on a vine.
🍅 I am not an ingredient in ketchup.

food.question: I am a sweet treat that comes in many flavors. I am cold and you often eat me in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I'm usually served in a cone or a cup.
🥶 I need to stay cold, or I will melt!
🍧 I am a popular dessert.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast, and baked in an oven. You can put all sorts of toppings on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am often round and sliced into triangles.
🇮🇹 I originated in Italy.
🍅 Tomato sauce is my base.

food.question: I am a yellow spread made from seeds. You can put me on bread with jelly. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 Squirrels love the main ingredient.
🥪 I am often paired with jelly in a sandwich.
🌱 I come from a plant.

food.question: I am a long, green vegetable with many small bumps. You can pickle me or eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I'm used to make pickles.
🌱 I grow on a vine.
🥗 I'm a crunchy addition to salads.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I give you light during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌎 Plants need me to grow.
🌞 I rise in the East.

cosmos.question: I shine at night, but I don't have light of my own. I reflect the sun's light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm a crescent.
🐺 Werewolves like me!
🌑 I go through phases.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that makes my own light. There are many like me in the sky, but they are very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle at night
🔭 Astronomers use telescopes to study me.
🌟 I am made of hydrogen and helium.

cosmos.question: I am where you live! I spin around the sun once a year. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I have lots of plants and animals.
💧 I am mostly covered in water.
🌍 I am the third planet from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a hot, rocky planet, known for being red. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I share a color with chocolate.
🚀 People are planning to visit me one day.
🔴 They call me the Red Planet.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system! I have a big red spot.

hints.text: 🌪️ My spot is a giant storm!
🪐 I have lots of moons.
✨ I'm made mostly of gas.

cosmos.question: I am a planet known for my beautiful rings! What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🌬️ I'm a gas giant.
💫 I am the sixth planet from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a collection of billions of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I look like a blurry band of light in the night sky.
🍪 I am shaped like a spiral.
🥛 My name is a type of drink.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that seem to form a pattern in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 One popular one looks like a bear.
📜 People have been using me to navigate for centuries.
✨ I am made of stars.

cosmos.question: I am a celestial object made of ice and dust that sometimes has a tail when I get close to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ Sometimes, people think I bring bad luck.
❄️ I am like a dirty snowball.
💫 My tail always points away from the sun.
